name: public-investment-hnd
title: Public investment
description: Public investment projects, understood as the use of taxes by the government, to invest with the objective of benefiting the population through infrastructure works, services, development of productive projects, incentives in the creation and development of companies, promotion of commercial activities, generation of employment, protection of fundamental rights (health, education, social protection, etc.), and improvement of the quality of life.

contributors.title: Secretary of Finance of Honduras (SEFIN) / Regulatory Office of Contracting and Acquisitions of the State of Honduras (ONCAE)

sources.title: Secretary of Finance of Honduras (SEFIN) / Regulatory Office of Contracting and Acquisitions of the State of Honduras (ONCAE)

resources.name: investment-projects
resources.title: Investment projects
resources.description: Public investment projects, understood as the use of taxes by the government, to invest with the objective of benefiting the population through infrastructure works, services, development of productive projects, incentives in the creation and development of companies, promotion of commercial activities, generation of employment, protection of fundamental rights (health, education, social protection, etc.), and improvement of the quality of life.

fields.name: IdProyecto
fields.description: Project identifier code within MapaInversiones.

fields.name: NombreProyecto
fields.description: Full name of the investment project in the public investment system (SNIP).

fields.name: FechaInicioProyecto
fields.description: Project start date.

fields.name: FechaFinProyecto
fields.description: Project end date.

fields.name: costo_estimado_lempiras
fields.description: Estimated cost of the project in lempiras.

fields.name: costo_estimado_usd
fields.description: Estimated cost of the project in USD.

fields.name: NombreSector
fields.description: Name of the sector to which the investment project belongs. Eg. Education, Health, Transportation.

fields.name: EntidadEjecutora
fields.description: Corresponds to the primary executor of the project.

fields.name: DuracionProyecto
fields.description: Duration in years of the project.

fields.name: TipoProyecto
fields.description: Type of project scope. E.g. National, Departmental or Municipal.

fields.name: CodigoSNIP
fields.description: Project identifier code within the project bank is the unique identifier of the investment project in (SNIP System).

fields.name: NumeroBeneficiariosHombres
fields.description: Number of male beneficiaries of the project

fields.name: NumeroBeneficiariosMujeres
fields.description: Number of female beneficiaries of the project.

fields.name: NombreDepartamento
fields.description: Name of the department where the project is located.

fields.name: NombreMunicipio
fields.description: Name of the municipality where the project is located.

fields.name: nombreestado
fields.description: Current stage the project is in. Execution, Programming.

resources.name: general-budget
resources.title: General Budget of the Republic
resources.description: It is the expression of the annual operating plan in terms of income, expenses and financing under a budget methodology that facilitates the analysis, discussion, approval and public knowledge of the financial management of State entities.

fields.name: Gestion
fields.description: Year in which the budget operation is being carried out.

fields.name: Mes
fields.description: Month in which the budget operation is being carried out.

fields.name: Nivel_de_Administracion
fields.description: It is the level of administration, which can be CENTRAL ADMINISTRATION OR DECENTRALIZED INSTITUTIONS

fields.name: Institucion
fields.description: Higher level grouping that contains the accounting group or the executing Institution.

fields.name: Gerencia Administrativa
fields.description: Area responsible for administration within the institution.

fields.name: Unidad Ejecutora
fields.description: Entity in charge of the execution of projects and activities.

fields.name: Programa
fields.description: It is the highest level programmatic category, it produces final goods and services that the institution delivers to the population. A Program contains subprograms, activities, projects and works, which are the lowest level categories.

fields.name: Subprograma
fields.description: In a Sub-program, partial final products are made, and in a program there must be 2 or more sub-programs and their products must be added to have the final products of the program.

fields.name: Proyecto
fields.description: Generally, projects generate an investment or a good and satisfy a need of the population at the end of their development. A project has a completion time unlike a program which can be permanent.

fields.name: Actividad u Obra
fields.description: It is where the work is carried out, actions with which the final products will be generated; In this lower level category, is where inputs such as financial resources, human resources and materials are located.

fields.name: Organismo
fields.description: Entity or body that participates in the execution of the budget.

fields.name: Fuente de Financiamiento
fields.description: This classification of expenses consists of presenting expenses according to the generic types of resources used for their financing. This type of classification allows the government to identify the source of income, as well as its orientation towards meeting public needs.

fields.name: BIP
fields.description: Project identification number within the budget.

fields.name: Finalidad
fields.description: Main objective of the expense or investment made.

fields.name: Funcion
fields.description: Area of ​​performance or responsibility within the public administration.

fields.name: Grupo de Objeto
fields.description: Grouper of expense objects (Expense_Object).

fields.name: Objeto del Gasto
fields.description: This classifier includes the systematic and homogeneous organization of goods, services and transfers that the Public Sector applies in the development of its management.

fields.name: Beneficiario de Transferencia
fields.description: It is the classification that identifies the beneficiaries of the operation. It is recorded only in the disbursements or transfers without compensation made by public entities intended to finance the gross formation of capital or current expenses by the different public, private or external economic agents.

fields.name: Aprobado Ministro
fields.description: Approved minister, it is the first step of approval.

fields.name: Aprobado
fields.description: It is the budget approved by the National Congress annually, which will present information on the net transactions that said Public Sector will carry out with the rest of the economy and will contain, at a minimum, the consolidation of income, expenses and financing, the expected economic and financial results. and its presentation in institutional aggregates useful for economic analysis.

fields.name: Vigente
fields.description: It includes budget modifications (increase, decrease and transfers) of the estimate of resources and budgetary credits authorized by the Legislative Branch in the General Budget of Income and Expenditures of the Republic, once its execution has begun for a fiscal period.

fields.name: EjecuciÃ³n al mes
fields.description: Refers to the Monthly Accrued/Executed.

fields.name: EjecuciÃ³n Acumulada
fields.description: Refers to Accrual/Executed: It is the accounting basis by which transactions and other events are recognized when they occur and not when they are collected or paid in cash or its equivalent. Its registration reflects the moment in which the economic value is created, transformed, exchanged, transferred or extinguished. The moment of “accrual” of income will be recognized as occurring when, in accordance with current legislation, the right to collection in favor of the State and, correlatively, a payment obligation borne by a natural or legal person arises. duly individualized and for a certain amount. Likewise, the moment of “accrual” of expenses will be recognized when the conforming receipt of the goods and services duly contracted or the legal and/or administrative requirements established by the current regulations for expenses without consideration occur; implies the definitive impact of the budget allocation and may generate an immediate or deferred payment obligation.

fields.name: Disponible
fields.description: It is the result of the Budgeted in the Current column minus the Executed_Accumulated column.

fields.name: % de Ejecucion
fields.description: It is the Cumulative Executed Percentage

resources.name: thematic-budgets
resources.title: Thematic Budgets (Gender Perspective)
resources.description: The Budget with a Gender Perspective (PPG), a public policy tool that allows identifying the State investment that is allocated through the General Budget of the Republic to reduce and eliminate gaps between men and women, promoting greater autonomy in the economic sphere. , physical, decision-making and the interrelation of these.

fields.name: Gestión
fields.description: Year in which the budget operation is being carried out.

fields.name: mes
fields.description: Month in which the budget operation is being carried out.

fields.name: Area
fields.description: General category that groups related activities or topics, in this case focused on gender marking.

fields.name: Sub-Area
fields.description: Subcategory within an area that specifies a particular focus or additional detail related to the main area.

fields.name: Nivel_de_Administración
fields.description: Area responsible for administration within the institution.

fields.name: Institución
fields.description: Entity in charge of the execution of projects and activities.
